Comment 1: 
I don't know what is wrong here.  I want to note that on the web playground time.Now()
always returns the same value, a date that happens to be a Tuesday.  So on the web
playground your program should always print "Too far away."  I can confirm that your
second version prints "In two days." but I don't know why.
